title: New: Vacationer – Trip (Mmoths Remix)
body:
Following on from the release of his debut EP and a host of successful UK dates, Irish beatmaestro **Mmoths** has dropped a new remix of one of last years hottest tracks.

Emphasizing the original beat that made _Trip_ one of 2011’s blog-hits, this remix is arguably **Jack Colleran’s** finest to date, sculpting what is already a fantastic pop track into a perfect chillout summer jam. Check it out below and grab a free download.
